text: Polina Alexeyevna Popova (; born 1 June 1995) is a Russian model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Russia 2017. She represented Russia at the Miss World 2017 competition, where she placed in the Top 10. ==Early life== Popova was born in Yekaterinburg. She works as a model, and in addition to Russian, she can speak fluent English and Chinese. She is currently studying at Moscow State University, with plans on becoming a journalist. ==Pageantry== ===Miss Russia 2017=== Popova represented Sverdlovsk Oblast in the Miss Russia 2017 pageant; it was her first ever pageant. She went on to win the competition, winning ₽3,000,000, a Hyundai Solaris, and the opportunity to study at any university in the world. Her runners-up were Ksenia Alexandrova of Moscow and Albina Akhtyamova of Bashkortostan. Popova represented Russia in the Miss World 2017 competition, where she placed in the Top 10. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Yekaterinburg Category:Russian beauty pageant winners Category:Russian female models Category:Miss Russia winners Category:Miss World 2017 delegates
title: Polina Popova
